dialogue_turns.speaker: Intro
dialogue_turns.text: Petropavlovsk, a city under siege by insects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Petropavlovsk, a city under siege by insects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Swarms of mosquitoes and gnats have completely overrun Petropavlovsk, according to Channel Seven.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Swarms of mosquitoes and gnats have completely overrun Petropavlovsk, according to Channel Seven.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents of Petropavlovsk are struggling to spend time outdoors as swarms of mosquitoes and gnats have taken over the city, citing Channel Seven.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that sounds absolutely miserable. I can't imagine trying to just, uh, go for a walk or anything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that sounds absolutely miserable. I can't imagine trying to just, uh, go for a walk or anything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's linked to the recent spring floods, which apparently created the perfect breeding conditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's linked to the recent spring floods, which apparently created the perfect breeding conditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the channel, the mass emergence of insects is linked to the recent spring floods.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the locals are saying it's hard to even breathe outside? Like, insects flying into mouths and noses?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the locals are saying it's hard to even breathe outside? Like, insects flying into mouths and noses?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Locals say it's becoming increasingly difficult to breathe outdoors, as the insects fly into people's mouths and noses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. One resident mentioned that as soon as the sun sets, they come in by the dozens, whole swarms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. One resident mentioned that as soon as the sun sets, they come in by the dozens, whole swarms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As soon as the sun begins to set, to be honest, the mosquitoes come flying in by the dozens"whole swarms, one resident shared.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, and the biting is aggressive too. Their children are getting bitten all over, it's horrible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, and the biting is aggressive too. Their children are getting bitten all over, it's horrible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, mosquitoes are biting aggressively. Our children have been bitten all over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The city did allocate 20 million tenge from the budget this year to try and control them, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The city did allocate twenty million tenge from the budget this year to try and control them, though.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The report notes that 20 million tenge has been allocated from the city budget this year for insect control.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But heavy rainfall has been disrupting the disinfection efforts, right? So they can't spray on schedule.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But heavy rainfall has been disrupting the disinfection efforts, right? So they can't spray on schedule.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, heavy rainfall has disrupted timely disinfection efforts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a real problem. They're focusing on densely populated areas first—parks, recreation spots, the outskirts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a real problem. They're focusing on densely populated areas first-parks, recreation spots, the outskirts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So far, treatments are being carried out in densely populated areas, including parks, recreation spots, and the outskirts of the city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: How much area are they actually planning to treat?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: How much area are they actually planning to treat?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Well, so far 600 hectares across the city are being treated, but they expect to cover over 2,000 hectares by the end of the season.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, so far six hundred hectares across the city are being treated, but they expect to cover over two thousand hectares by the end of the season.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In total, 600 hectares across the city are subject to treatment. Overall, more than 2,000 hectares are expected to be treated by the end of the season, said Asem Aitulova, spokesperson for the Petropavlovsk akim's office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the work is supposed to continue until September, with multiple rounds of spraying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the work is supposed to continue until September, with multiple rounds of spraying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work will continue until September, with multiple rounds of spraying planned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's according to Asem Aitulova, from the akim's office spokesperson. It's a huge operation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's according to Asem Aitulova, from the akim's office spokesperson. It's a huge operation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Overall, more than 2,000 hectares are expected to be treated by the end of the season, said Asem Aitulova, spokesperson for the Petropavlovsk akim's office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, is it even making a dent if the weather keeps causing delays?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, is it even making a dent if the weather keeps causing delays?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's gotta be frustrating for everyone involved. You know, you plan this big response and then nature just, um, has other ideas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's gotta be frustrating for everyone involved. You know, you plan this big response and then nature just, um, has other ideas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Astana's dealing with something similar too—their akimat announced their own control measures recently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Astana's dealing with something similar too-their akimat announced their own control measures recently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Astana's akimat announced that the city launched mosquito control measures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It seems like a regional issue this year. Just a tough season for outdoor living.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It seems like a regional issue this year. Just a tough season for outdoor living.
